name: User to login in successfully and buy a book Online (Integration Testing)

testSteps.description: User to login in successfully and buy a book Online (Integration Testing) #1: {userName=ram, password=ram, searchCriteria=usertype, user_id=1, book_id=1, statusCode=202, paymenttype=NetBanking}

children.description: Given a user
When send request with "ram" and "ram" to login in Online Book store application
POST http://onlinebookstorecognizant.us-east-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/loginapi

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 12:19:04 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.39 (Amazon) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Keep-Alive: timeout=60, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

children.description: Then the status code of login should be "202"
And user should be logged in into Book Application
When send request to fetch the books based on "usertype"
GET http://onlinebookstorecognizant.us-east-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/viewBooks/e

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 12:19:04 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.39 (Amazon) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Length: 129
Keep-Alive: timeout=60, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive

children.description: Then the status code should be "202"
And books based on "usertype" should be displayed
When send request with "1" and "1" to add the book in cart for Online Book store application
POST http://onlinebookstorecognizant.us-east-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/addToCart

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 12:19:06 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.39 (Amazon) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Keep-Alive: timeout=60, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

children.description: Then the status code should be "202"
And book should be successfully added to the cart
When send request to generate the OTP with "1", "1" and PaymentID
POST http://onlinebookstorecognizant.us-east-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/buynow

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 12:19:07 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.39 (Amazon) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Keep-Alive: timeout=60, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

children.description: Then the status code should be "202"
And OTP should be generated successfully
When send request to buy the selected book with  "1", "1" PaymentID "NetBanking" and OTP
POST http://onlinebookstorecognizant.us-east-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/addpayment

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 12:19:07 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.39 (Amazon) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Keep-Alive: timeout=60, max=100
Connection: Keep-Alive
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

children.description: Then the status code should be "202"

title: User to login in successfully and buy a book Online (Integration Testing)
